mapper.sql: id, user_id, way, phone, head_img, nick_name, user_name, sex, province, city, country, hospital_name, hospital_grade, department_one, department_two, professional, forte, number, card_img, status, create_time, is_login_first, source, manager_id, operate_time, spare1, spare2, spare3, download_types, download_count
mapper.select:
select
from hd_user_detail where phone = #{phone} order by id desc limit 1
select usrd.*,usrl.frozen from hd_user_detail usrd right join hd_user_login usrl on usrd.user_id=usrl.id where 1=1

select usrd.*,usrl.frozen from hd_user_detail usrd right join hd_user_login usrl on usrd.user_id=usrl.id where 1=1 and usrl.id in
${id}
